mapper.insert: insert into fc_naturaldanger_study_t (id, uid, checker, del, ctime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into fc_naturaldanger_study_t
id,
uid,
checker,
del,
ctime,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update fc_naturaldanger_study_t
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from fc_naturaldanger_study_t where id = (select max(id) from fc_naturaldanger_study_t)

select
from fc_naturaldanger_study_t where del = 0 and uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ctime DESC

select
from fc_naturaldanger_study_t where del = 0 and uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ctime >= date(now()) and ctime < DATE_ADD(date(now()),INTERVAL 1 DAY) order by ctime DESC
